thread.title: Panthers Luke Kuechly Cleared To Play Against Seahawks
thread.title_full: Panthers Luke Kuechly Cleared To Play Against Seahawks

title: Panthers Luke Kuechly Cleared To Play Against Seahawks
text:
Panthers Luke Kuechly Cleared To Play Against Seahawks Tools 
Story Created: Oct 13, 2015 at 10:28 AM   13, 2015 at 10:59 AM EDT 
CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- The Carolina Panthers say linebacker Luke Kuechly has been cleared to play, according to a source. 
Kuechly has been under the NFL's concussion protocol after suffering a concussion in week one against the Jaguars. He left the game late in the first half after leading with his head to tackle Jaguars running back T.J. Yeldon. 
The Panthers are coming off a BYE week and will play against the Seattle Seahawks.
